issues.description: The solution’s PersonService class adds a constructor parameter and an attribute of type PersonRepository, conflicting with the problem statement note “Do not change the attributes of PersonService” and mismatching the template, which defines only a no-arg constructor and a single List<Person> field. This discrepancy will confuse students and break the expected wiring/tests.
issues.suggested_fix: Align the solution’s PersonService with the template and problem spec by removing the PersonRepository parameter and field. Use only the original no-arg constructor and the single List<Person> attribute as intended for the exercise.
